sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT  NULL AS SYS_CHANGE_VERSION
	   ,NULL AS SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION
	   ,NULL AS SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION
	   ,NULL AS SYS_CHANGE_COLUMNS
	   ,NULL AS SYS_CHANGE_CONTEXT
	   ,NULL AS CT_CustomerId
	  ,F.[CustomerId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([CustomerName],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [CustomerName]
      ,[CustomerType]
      ,[PORequired]
      ,[AccountNo]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([VATCodeNo],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [VATCodeNo]
      ,[Terms]
      ,[DefaultInvoiceAddress]
      ,[DefaultShippingAddress]
      ,[TaxCodeId]
      ,[ExchangeRateId]
      ,[AbbreviatedName]
      , REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([Alias],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [Alias]
      ,[DefaultInvoicePostingAddress]
      ,[DimensionsCustomer]
      ,[DimensionsAccountNo]
      ,[ApprovalSystem]
      ,[DefaultLegalEntityAddress]
      ,[CurrencyId]
      ,[SiteId]
      ,[OB10Number]
      ,[CustomerDeleted]
      ,[CreatedDate]
      ,[UpdatedDate]
      ,[BillTo]
      ,[SoldTo]
      ,[ShipTo]
      ,[DAXCustomerId]
      ,[GS1EntityGLIN]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([GS1CompanyName],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [GS1CompanyName]
      ,[GS1UpdatedOn]
      ,[GS1UpdatedBy]
      ,[GS1UpdatedFrom]
      ,[ShowTaxQuote]
      ,[EDIAccountNumber]
      ,[AutoInvoice]
      ,[ChecklistException]
      ,[PortfolioGroupId]
      ,[ScoroAPICustomerName]
      ,[NSection]
      ,[BankId]
      ,[Ogone]
      ,[ServiceChargeExempt]
  FROM [dbo].[tbl_customers]  F

SELECT  NULL AS SYS_CHANGE_VERSION
	   ,NULL AS SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION
	   ,NULL AS SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION
	   ,NULL AS SYS_CHANGE_COLUMNS
	   ,NULL AS SYS_CHANGE_CONTEXT
	   ,NULL AS CT_CustomerId
	  ,F.[CustomerId]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([CustomerName],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [CustomerName]
      ,[CustomerType]
      ,[PORequired]
      ,[AccountNo]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([VATCodeNo],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [VATCodeNo]
      ,[Terms]
      ,[DefaultInvoiceAddress]
      ,[DefaultShippingAddress]
      ,[TaxCodeId]
      ,[ExchangeRateId]
      ,[AbbreviatedName]
      , REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([Alias],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [Alias]
      ,[DefaultInvoicePostingAddress]
      ,[DimensionsCustomer]
      ,[DimensionsAccountNo]
      ,[ApprovalSystem]
      ,[DefaultLegalEntityAddress]
      ,[CurrencyId]
      ,[SiteId]
      ,[OB10Number]
      ,[CustomerDeleted]
      ,[CreatedDate]
      ,[UpdatedDate]
      ,[BillTo]
      ,[SoldTo]
      ,[ShipTo]
      ,[DAXCustomerId]
      ,[GS1EntityGLIN]
      ,REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE([GS1CompanyName],'^',''),'"',''),'\',''),CHAR(10),''),CHAR(13),'') AS [GS1CompanyName]
      ,[GS1UpdatedOn]
      ,[GS1UpdatedBy]
      ,[GS1UpdatedFrom]
      ,[ShowTaxQuote]
      ,[EDIAccountNumber]
      ,[AutoInvoice]
      ,[ChecklistException]
      ,[PortfolioGroupId]
      ,[ScoroAPICustomerName]
      ,[NSection]
      ,[BankId]
      ,[Ogone]
      ,[ServiceChargeExempt]
  FROM [dbo].[tbl_customers]  F
